name: Wake Up Awesome Smoothie
description: It’s all in the name! Feel awesome and glowy with this smoothie that’s also a complete meal. Coconut water is refreshing and full of electrolytes for hydration, and blueberries and spinach have loads of vitamins for a healthy start to your day!
preparation: 1. In a blender, combine coconut milk beverage, spinach, coconut water, blueberries, oats, banana, protein blend, and Apple Pie Spice. If you like it thicker; add ice cubes; for a thinner consistency, add water. Blend until smooth and pour into a tall glass.
